message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'd find very valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $115.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob, but $115 is a fair price for the value this product offers. How about we settle in the middle at $107?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to offer $105 for it.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. I'm willing to come down slightly to $106, but I can't go any lower.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I am willing to pay $104 for the product.
